Command.CommandString: SELECT WCS_TASK.*,product.CategoryCode,Product.Spec,Product.ProductName,Newproduct.CategoryCode as NewCategoryCode,NewProduct.Spec as NewSpec,billtypename,statedesc,cellName, case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' or (wcs_task.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in ('1','2','3','8')) then Aisle.StationNoAddress2 when wcs_task.TaskType IN('12','15') OR (wcs_task.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in ('0','4','5','6','10')) then WCS_TASK.CellCode end as FromStation, case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' or (wcs_task.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in ('1','2','3','8')) then WCS_TASK.CellCode when wcs_task.TaskType IN('12','15') OR (wcs_task.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in ('0','4','5','6','10')) then Aisle.StationNoAddress3 end as ToStation, case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' or (wcs_task.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in ('1','2','3','8')) then Aisle.StationNo1 when wcs_task.TaskType IN('12','15') OR (wcs_task.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in ('0','4','5','6','10')) then Aisle.StationNo3 end as ConveyFromStation, case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' or (wcs_task.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in ('1','2','3','8')) then Aisle.StationNo2 when wcs_task.TaskType IN('12','15') OR (wcs_task.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in ('0','4','5','6','10')) then Aisle.StationNo4 end as ConveyToStation FROM WCS_TASk left join CMD_Cell Cell on WCS_TASK.CellCode=cell.CellCode left join CMD_Shelf Shelf on cell.ShelfCode=Shelf.ShelfCode left join CMD_Aisle Aisle on Shelf.AisleNo=Aisle.AisleNo left join VCMD_Product Product on WCS_TASK.ProductCode=product.ProductCode left join VCMD_Product NewProduct on wcs_task.NewProductCode=NewProduct.ProductCode left join CMD_BillType On CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode=WCS_TASK.BillTypeCode left join Sys_TableState on Sys_TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and WCS_TASK.State=Sys_TableState.State Where {0} ORDER BY WCS_TASK.TaskLevel,WCS_TASK.RequestDate,WCS_TASK.StartDate,WCS_TASK.TaskNo

SELECT CMD_Cell.*, CMD_Area.AreaName, CMD_Shelf.ShelfName, CMD_Shelf.Columns, CMD_Shelf.Rows,VCmd_Product.ProductName,VCmd_Product.Unit FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Area ON CMD_Cell.AreaCode = CMD_Area.AreaCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode left join VCmd_Product on cmd_cell.ProductCode=VCmd_Product.ProductCode order by CMD_Cell.CellCode
SELECT CMD_Cell.* FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode Where {0} order by CMD_Cell.CellCode
update WCS_Task set FinishReturnCode=@ReturnCode where TaskNo=@TaskNo
